select
distinct
from up_project_info
order by ${orderByClause}

update up_project_info set platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lgt = #{lgt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_date = #{finishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_check_no = #{finishCheckNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sup_level = #{supLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_phone = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, capital_source = #{capitalSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, labour_name = #{labourName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, labour_mobile = #{labourMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, labour_card = #{labourCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_deposit = #{cashDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, government = #{government,jdbcType=CHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=CHAR}, build_type = #{buildType,jdbcType=CHAR}, invest_type = #{investType,jdbcType=CHAR}, sum_acreage = #{sumAcreage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sum_invest = #{sumInvest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, proj_scale = #{projScale,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status_change_date = #{statusChangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, safety_no = #{safetyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proj_contract_code = #{projContractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proj_contract_sign_date = #{projContractSignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, proj_contract_price = #{projContractPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, report_code = #{reportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from up_project_info
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT u.id as 'id', u.city_code as 'cityCode', u.report_code as 'reportCode', up.builder_license_no as 'builderLicenseNo', (select c.credit_code from up_project_company c where c.company_type = 'QY05' and c.proj_id = #{projId}) as 'constructNo', (select c.credit_code from up_project_company c where c.company_type = 'QY01' and c.proj_id = #{projId}) as 'buildNo', u.name as 'name', u.name as 'remarkName', u.address as 'address', u.start_date as 'startDate', u.end_date as 'endDate', 2 as 'projScale', udr.code as 'status', udr1.code as 'type', u.manager_name as 'managerName', u.manager_phone as 'managerPhone' FROM up_project_info u LEFT JOIN up_project_certificate up on up.proj_id = u.id LEFT JOIN up_dict_report udr on udr.api_code = u.status and udr.api_type='project_status' and udr.report_city_code = '340300' LEFT JOIN up_dict_report udr1 on udr1.api_code = u.type and udr1.api_type='project_type' and udr1.report_city_code = '340300' WHERE u.id = #{id}
